20101230020029.000|20101230020030.000|CC1|PLENTY OF OTHER WEATHER

20101230020034.000|20101230020036.000|CC1|PLENTY OF WEATHER DRAMA TONIGHT.
20101230020036.000|20101230020038.000|CC1|FOLKS ON THE 5 ARE CAUTIOUS

20101230020039.000|20101230020041.000|CC1|WHAT THEY ARE GOING TO GET.

20101230020043.000|20101230020046.000|CC1|>> WHEN I LEFT THIS MORNING THE 
20101230020046.000|20101230020047.000|CC1|WEATHER WAS NICE.               
20101230020047.000|20101230020050.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE SUN WAS OUT,   
20101230020050.000|20101230020051.000|CC1|THE ROADS WERE RELATIVELY DRY

20101230020103.000|20101230020104.000|CC1|LATER THIS.

20101230020110.000|20101230020112.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ANTHONY AND HIS    
20101230020112.000|20101230020113.000|CC1|FAMILY OF 13 CARAVANNED FROM    
20101230020113.000|20101230020115.000|CC1|SANTA CLARITA HOPING TO PLAY IN 
20101230020115.000|20101230020115.000|CC1|THE SNOW.

20101230020240.000|20101230020241.000|CC1|PER HOUR.

20101230020918.000|20101230020921.000|CC1|MAN WHO ROBBED AN ELDERLY WOMAN 
20101230020921.000|20101230020922.000|CC1|ON CHRISTMAS EVE.

20101230020924.000|20101230020928.000|CC1|THE WOMAN HAD TAKEN $400 FROM AN
20101230020928.000|20101230020929.000|CC1|ATM AND DROVE HOME.

20101230020931.000|20101230020932.000|CC1|GARAGE THE SUSPECT ASSAULTED HER
20101230020932.000|20101230020933.000|CC1|AND TOOK THE PURSE.

20101230020948.000|20101230020950.000|CC1|>>> PARADE WATCH IS A SECURITY  
20101230020950.000|20101230020952.000|CC1|PROGRAM PUT INTO PLACE AFTER    
20101230020952.000|20101230020952.000|CC1|9/11.                           
20101230020952.000|20101230020953.000|CC1|STARTING TODAY POLICE AND       
20101230020953.000|20101230020955.000|CC1|VOLUNTEERS ARE CHECKING

20101230021002.000|20101230021003.000|CC1|FOLKS ARE COMPLYING WITH THE    
20101230021003.000|20101230021004.000|CC1|REGULATIONS.

20101230021007.000|20101230021009.000|CC1|OF THE PARADE ROUTE ARE SUBJECT 
20101230021009.000|20101230021010.000|CC1|TO SECURITY SEARCHES.           
20101230021010.000|20101230021012.000|CC1|VEHICLES LEFT UNATTENDED

20101230021015.000|20101230021016.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO RECEIVE A VISIT FROM 
20101230021016.000|20101230021019.000|CC1|POLICE AND ARE IN COMPLIANCE GET
20101230021019.000|20101230021020.000|CC1|A COMMEMORATIVE PARADE WATCH    
20101230021020.000|20101230021027.000|CC1|DECAL.                          
20101230021027.000|20101230021051.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101230021027.000|20101230021029.000|CC1|>>> PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICIALS IN  
20101230021029.000|20101230021030.000|CC1|LONG BEACH ARE WARNING PEOPLE TO
20101230021030.000|20101230021032.000|CC1|STAY OUT OF THE OCEAN FOR THE   
20101230021032.000|20101230021033.000|CC1|NEXT 72 HOURS.

20101230021036.000|20101230021038.000|CC1|STORM RUNOFF COULD SICKEN PEOPLE
20101230021038.000|20101230021040.000|CC1|WHO COME IN CONTACT WITH THE    
20101230021040.000|20101230021041.000|CC1|WATER.

20101230021043.000|20101230021044.000|CC1|OCEAN IN LONG BEACH.
